Review Text: These are really cute, and they are a great size for a variety of looks. I really like hair clips…some are far too big to use for anything but all of ones hair and you must have a lot. These are a nice medium size, great colors, and really adorable.

reference_summary:
Qiray Hair Ties For Women Coil Hair Ties,Large Lace Phnom Penh,5 Colors 10 Pieces.
Qiray
{'Material': 'Rubber', 'Item Form': 'elastic', 'Brand': 'Qiray', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches', 'Number of Pieces': '10', 'Product Dimensions': '3.15 x 3.15 x 2.36 inches; 2.82 Ounces', 'UPC': '655160582486'}
I really enjoyed having something this pretty to put in my hair. You get two of each color, and they are very pretty. I don’t have a lot of hair so they were a bit lose on me. With the pearls on them, they really don’t wrap around too many times and look the same. My daughter put them around her bun in her hair. This accentuated the beauty of the hairpiece, and it worked really well-just an idea for these beautiful hair accessories. They are prettier than the pictures. I’ll be interested to see how long they stay together so I’ll put an update later on how well they last. Very pleased with this product so far, but they are not for people with thin hair.
Really beautifully made
QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White
QTMY
['QTMY Fashion Rhinestone Flower Headband,Wide Hair Hoop for Women,Hair Accessories Head Band Headwear,White']

I love this very much. The colors and the beads are amazing ! It did lose one bead when I first got it so that wasn’t nice but I can put it back on sometime. It is very heavy so it slides a lot and is heavy on the head. I get headaches from heavy things so I just have to wear it for special things. I love it very much.
Very  beautiful.

These are very pretty but very thin. The glue on the back of them is super sticky and a mess to clean off your fingers. I don’t recommend these. I use a different brand that can last up to a week, but these peeked of within about two days. Not all the great to cut and file, either. I was not happy with them, I do not recommend. The color was beautiful though.
Very thin.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preferences:** The user appreciates aesthetically pleasing hair accessories, particularly those with unique designs and embellishments like pearls, rhinestones, and vibrant colors. Recent purchases indicate a strong inclination towards versatile items that enhance beauty while accommodating different hairstyles.

- **User Engagement:** While durability and performance are important, the user has highlighted a growing appreciation for comfort and functionality, especially with clips that are the right size and fit. She is committed to sharing feedback on product usability and effectiveness.

- **Performance Consideration:** Attentive to weight and comfort, the user seeks accessories that provide a secure yet comfortable fit. She values products that maintain aesthetic appeal and practical usability, particularly for thin hair.

- **Hair Type Consideration:** The user continues to choose items that cater to her and her daughter’s hair types, favoring products that adhere well to thin hair while being inclusive of all hair types.

- **Color Variety:** She enjoys a wide array of colors in beauty products, favoring options that allow for self-expression and promote vibrant designs.

- **Family Orientation:** Her engagement with beauty products frequently extends to her daughter, reflecting a preference for multifunctional items that cater to both of their needs.

Overall, the user prioritizes beauty, functionality, and comfort while fostering shared experiences, continually seeking accessories that blend aesthetic appeal with practical usability.
